name: Stone Guardian
damage_immunities: poison, psychic; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (7d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. The target makes a DC 18 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

bonus_actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The guardian targets one or more creatures within 30 feet. Each target makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is slowed for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Constructed Nature
special_abilities.desc: Guardians dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.
